summary: This bill, the Fair Accounting for Condominium Construction Act (H.R. 2759), amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an exception to the percentage of completion method of accounting for certain residential construction contracts. It replaces "home construction contract" with "residential construction contract" in relevant sections, modifies the application of the exception for alternative minimum tax calculations, and specifies that the amendments apply to contracts entered into after the bill's enactment.
